sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter to Dr. Sherlock, in vindication of that part of Josephus's history, which gives an account of Iaddus the high-priest's submitting to Alexander the Great while Darius was living against the answer to the piece intituled, Obedience and submission to the present government. Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
[4], 33, [2] p.
Printed for Thomas Jones ..., London : 1691.
Half title: A letter to Dr. Sherlock, in vindication of his late book, entituled The case of allegiance. Advertisement: p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Duke University Library. Includes bibliographical references.
=======
A letter to Dr. Sherlock, in vindication of that part of Josephus's history, which gives an account of Iaddus the high-priest's submitting to Alexander the Great while Darius was living against the answer to the piece intituled, Obedience and submission to the present government. Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
[4], 33, [2] p.
Printed for Thomas Jones ..., London : 1691.
Half title: A letter to Dr. Sherlock, in vindication of his late book, entituled The case of allegiance. Advertisement: p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Duke University Library. Includes bibliographical references.
Thomas Jones
